I searched the existing bugs, but due to the infinite variations that could 
exist in the WSDL with namespacing, et al, I have no idea if this is an 
existing or brand new problem.  It is painful because as it stands, the web 
service descriptor is useless to me.

Rich, is this a dup of bug 105500?
WORKSFORME - This bug does not appear with WTP1.0. It does complain about loading the schema for mapping, but the DefinitionsImpl object is initialized just fine.
Retested on WTP1.5 RC1a, still WORKSFORME. I recommend resolve as such.
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
